title: Can't equip new emotes
body: Yesterday i got the level 40 emote and i can't equip it for some reason.

replies.body: I've been seeing these strange emote errors pop up lately, but so far we haven't been able to narrow down precisely what causes them. Most players have been able to get them to save correctly by logging out and back in until it works, but it might be worthwhile to go ahead and try running a quick repair as well. Let me know if something works or doesn't though!!
